## üß≠ Objective:  
Explore the structure and influence of global governance institutions.
## ‚úçÔ∏è Prompt: 
Which institutions dominate global governance? How do their domains shape international cooperation?

## üì• Load Data
```{r}
governance <- read_csv("assets/datasets/global_governance.csv")

governance %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = institution, y = influence_score, fill = domain)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(title = "Influence of Global Governance Institutions",
       x = "Institution", y = "Influence Score") +
  theme_minimal()
```
